BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-TetraScape
BundleInfo.Author: Jitin Singla
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Protein Visualization using tetrahedral design language
BundleInfo.Description: The representations or models are generated using a regular tetrahedron building block. The design language allows users to generate protein representations with unique silhouettes. Users can render parts of the protein at amino acid resolution and rest as a volumetric rendering called “massing”. This gives users the option to generate two types of models, TetraChain models, where complete protein is represented at amino acid resolution, and TetraMass models, which combine massing to generate multi-resolution representations.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: tetraChain :: General :: Creates a TetraChain model
ChimeraX :: Command :: tetraMass :: General :: Creates a TetraMass model
